questions.text: What is the intersection of sets A = {1, 2, 3} and B = {2, 3, 4}?
questions.explanation: The intersection of two sets contains elements that are common to both sets. In this case, 2 and 3 are the only elements present in both sets A and B.

questions.text: What is the union of sets P = {a, b} and Q = {b, c}?
questions.explanation: The union of two sets contains all unique elements from both sets. In this case, combining elements from both sets gives us {a, b, c}.
